feed.title: OpenSign Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: issue of owner subscription has expired in guest login by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/716

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.6.1...v1.6.2

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add resend mail api, add expiry date in create document api & return certificate url in get document api by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/720
  • feat: add folder APIs by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/728
  • feat: add help message button on send-in-order in request signature form by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/727
  • fix: tour & model for email verification is shown simultaneously in sign-yourself flow by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/718
  • fix: help button is not clickable on user profile near disable documentId switch by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/723
  • fix: make entire folder selection box clickable and remove for template form by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/726
  • [SECURITY] Package update by @Zathiel in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/705

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.6.2...v1.7.0

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: change parameter name in updatefolder API by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/735

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.7.0...v1.7.1

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add certificate in completed webhook by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/738
  • fix: change baseUrl in APIs by @ugoconsonni in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/719
  • fix: resend mail API is not working by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/737
  • fix: some webhook event are not working for second signer & add certificate in completed webhook by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/738

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.7.1...v1.7.2

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add download button in ellipsis menu beside finish button so that signers can download a doc for reference before they sign by @prafull-opensignlabs in
  • feat: add copy icon beside API token to make it more user friendly by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/742
  • feat: move forget password button inside login box to make it look better by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/743
  • feat: add resend mail functionality for in-progress documents by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/744
  • feat: celebration confetti on document completion by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/753
  • feat: add delete folder API by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/740
  • feat: allow customizing email before resending signature request from In-progress documents report UI by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/749
  • feat: users can now send automatic reminders by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/754
  • feat: add tour messages to request signatures flow by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/763
  • feat: add help button for text validation by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/767
  • fix: unnecessary emails are sent when a signers sign a document via a shared link. by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/760
  • fix: issue in guest-login if document is created using API by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/766
  • build(dep): update parse-server package and it's dependencies by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/756
  • build(deps): update node-signpdf package and it's dependencies, remove customsignpdf by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/759
  • build(deps): update @reduxjs/toolkit package by @Zathiel in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/750
  • build(deps): react-redux, autoprefixer , react-datepicker axios, @reduxjs/toolkit, react-tooltip, tailwindcss react-pdf by @Zathiel in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/761
  • build(deps): update dependencies by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/762

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.7.2...v1.7.3
